data.name: TakeTurn
data.value: {0} enter a coord x,y to place your X or enter 'q' to give up:

data.name: MoveAccepted
data.value: Move accepted, here's the current board:

data.name: IncorrectFormat
data.value: Sorry - that format is incorrect! Try again...

data.name: CellUnavailable
data.value: Oh no, a piece is already at this place! Try again...

data.name: OutsideOfBounds
data.value: Oh no, those coordinates are outside the bounds of this board. Try again...

data.name: ComputerOrPersonPlayerSelection
data.value: Select 1 to play against the computer, or 2 to play with another person.

data.name: ComputerPlayerChosen
data.value: You've chosen to play the computer - You are playing as Player 1

data.name: IncorrectPlayerSelection
data.value: Oops - your selection doesn't match the options. Please try again.
